CustomField.description: NICC-036103 - Field Label was renamed due to a change in PLCM Transformer Terms & Conditions language. The customer will Opt In = True with checkbox checked, NOT Opt Out = True, even though this is contrary to the field API Name.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Flag for customer participating In Social Media (Chatter) usage or not.
CustomField.label: Opt Into Social Media
